title: Pompous and Cute Mamiya-San ~ The Beautiful PR Person in the Company Sits Next to Me - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Mature   Romance   Slice of Life
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Beautiful Female Lead   Engineer   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Office Romance   Secret Crush   Slow Romance
author: 小狐ミナト
description:
I, Yusuke Fujishiro, work at an IT agency. As an in-house engineer, I am the only one in a glittering company who is in the shadows.

Every day I’m exhausted from the work taken by the cool salespeople and from dealing with the conscious designers. Even so, I can do my best because of the high-level facial features of the girls.

However, as a shy person, I was only able to feast my eyes on them. But one day, the most beautiful PR person in the company, who has a history of winning a certain beauty contest, came to talk to me.

The PR lady who is an idol in the company is a bigger clunker than I expected?　She finds out that I’m actually a secret influencer and I have to produce and help her with her SNS operations.

A work-related romantic comedy by an insensitive, shy guy and a giggly, cheerful girl!>
